format: dashboard
execute:

---

```{python}
import inspect_viz as vz
penguins = vz.Data("penguins.parquet")
axes = ["body_mass", "flipper_length", "bill_depth", "bill_length"]

x_axis = vz.Param("body_mass")
y_axis = vz.Param("flipper_length")
```

## Row {.toolbar}

```{python}
vz.select("Species", penguins, column="species")
vz.select("X", options=axes, param=x_axis)
vz.select("Y", options=axes, param=y_axis)
```

## Row

```{python}
vz.plot(
    vz.dot(penguins, x=x_axis, y=y_axis, stroke="species", symbol="species"),
    grid=True,
    x_label="Body mass (g) →",
    y_label="↑ Flipper length (mm)",
    legend="symbol",
)
```

```{python}
vz.plot(
    vz.dot(penguins, x=x_axis, y=y_axis, fill="species", symbol="species"),
    grid=True,
    x_label="Body mass (g) →",
    y_label="↑ Flipper length (mm)",
    legend="symbol",
)
```

## Row

```{python}
vz.table(penguins)
```
